column5: I purchased this new to me junker  last night and brought her home. I tinkered around for a bit, but is was late. So this morning I woke up at 4 am as usuall. With only one thing in mind,  GITIRDONE. Temp plates, insurance run, parts run etc, etc. I swapped the hitch from the old to the new one, what a pita that was. A quick wiring job for the trailer lights and voila, finally I can rest now for a tad. There is more work ahead of me but shes in tow mode for the next 2 days ps, my youngest made a little something for my hard work
What a sweat heart I have
Another pic for you guys, I lost one day fishing but its worth it
nice step up Vince - and the daughter's gift is great ummm, can I ask how the exhaust is on this one?
in mint shape. I can hear the young pretty lady at timmies over the mike
Beats the heck out of what you had!
Eh...can't hear you sonny???  Think I just got my full hearing back from our trip last October!  Much better Vince!! Used to have one pretty similiar years ago.
That's a junker?  And you call that work?  Don't work too hard...
Good you have something to get yer boat to the lake!

I think Terrys luck went my way today I did manage to launch the boat and trolled for a while, with no luck.  So heres what happened after putting the boat on the trailer. I go to pull away and my front calipar seizes up Ok I will drive slowly home. After 5 minutes of driving I feel a tug I looked back and I see the trailer wheel smoking I did nurse it home only to find out that I have a coolant leak now. Good thing I have a decent parts car and plenty of new parts to add today. 37 deg celsius and 6 wheels to pull. I feel your pain Terry

nope new bearings, races, bearing buddies. I saved the spindle thank god, an hour of intense agony Going to PA for a new hub. After that a 4 wheel complete brake job, extra bolts for the hitch and im done for today. Theres fishing to be had
yikes one thing after another. brutal to be working in this heat today too, hopefully soon you'll be updating with some fresh fish pics
Possibly in the afternoon I can post a few pics
it sure does Albert, esp with the leather interior and comfort
